'''Yearning''' is a [[Special Dish]] that the player has a chance to obtain by cooking [[Pita Pocket]] with [[Collei]]. The recipe for Pita Pocket is obtainable by completing the {{Quest|Silent Seeker of Knowledge}}.

Yearning restores '''40'''% of Max HP and an additional '''2,350''' HP to the target character. Like most foods, this can not target other players' characters in [[Co-Op Mode]].
